ovdesc.p: This application is used to define the reason codes as applicable for the clearing module and linked through DD.CODES with the various possible events.
This application is used to default the various clearing codes in outward claim file based on the underlying events in DD.ITEM or DD.DDI.

desc.p: Specify the reason code as applicable for the direct debit clearing.
The reason code entered here is mapped with the events in DD.CODES application and based on the event, the reason code is defaulted while generating the outward claim file.
